word: The Lord would have us day by day [become] more like Christ, keeping His words, conforming to His precepts and example, entering more and more deeply every day into the spirit and meaning of God's requirements and gracious promises. . . . In God will we trust. Be of good courage in the Lord. Lean heavily upon Jesus' all-sustaining arm. . . . (Signed) Your Ellen.--Letter 37, June 28, 1878, to James White, who was traveling in the Eastern United States.
